tool.name: SAGA.shapes_points.17
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayREFERENCE False isArrayREFERENCE_ID False isArrayOBSERVATIONS False isArrayX False isArrayY False isArrayTRACK False isArrayDATE False isArrayTIME False isArrayPARAMETER False output_data_AGGREGATED $output_data_AGGREGATED name SAGA.shapes_points.17 REFERENCE $REFERENCE REFERENCE_ID $REFERENCE_ID OBSERVATIONS $OBSERVATIONS X $X Y $Y TRACK $TRACK DATE $DATE TIME $TIME PARAMETER $PARAMETER TIME_SPAN $TIME_SPAN FIX_TIME $FIX_TIME OFF_TIME $OFF_TIME EPS_TIME $EPS_TIME EPS_SPACE $EPS_SPACE VERBOSE $VERBOSE POLAR $POLAR prefer $prefer response $response outputType_AGGREGATED $OutputSection_AGGREGATED.outputType_AGGREGATED transmissionMode_AGGREGATED $OutputSection_AGGREGATED.transmissionMode_AGGREGATED

param.name: REFERENCE
param.label: Reference Points
param.help: Reference Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: REFERENCE_ID
param.label: ID
param.help: ID The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: OBSERVATIONS
param.label: Observations
param.help: Observations The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: X
param.label: X
param.help: X The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: Y
param.label: Y
param.help: Y The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TRACK
param.label: Track
param.help: Track The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DATE
param.label: Date
param.help: Date The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TIME
param.label: Time
param.help: expected to be the second of day The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: PARAMETER
param.label: Parameter
param.help: Parameter The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: EPS_SPACE
param.label: Maximum Distance
param.help: given as map units or meters if polar coordinates switch is on; ignored if set to zero

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_AGGREGATED
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
